::Ramulus::

Ramulus gallops into the Ark, skidding as he stops and transforms into robot 
mode. He nearly falls forward, looking at the others and breathing heavily.

"Ok," he says in between breaths, "Here's some stuff."

He produces a bunch of chips and guns out of various compartments, dumping 
them on the table.

"Those chips counteract their chips," he says, regaining his breath, "They'll 
report false information that you're under the Trainer's control, but they 
will keep you under your own control. The guns launch these chips, plus a 
modified virus, designed to destroy the mind control chips."

He glances at them all. "We each need one, if we're gonna fight them."
